notifications.title: "Summer Vacations"

notifications.title: "SUMMER GALA"
notifications.description:
MONDAY:FRUITS DAY(Students can come in colorful dresses and they can bring any summer fruit along them).
TUESDAY:ICE-CREAM+WATER DAY(Students should bring an amount not exceeding than 100rs, to buy an ice cream.They can also bring their swimming pools).

notifications.title: "Precautionery Measures"
notifications.description:
It is intimated to please send your child with a proper hygiene kit.It should be consisting of a hand sanitizer+hand wash+mask.Every child should wear mask before coming to school.As we love our students and we want them safe,healthy and happy always.
